backend/main.mo: Motoko backend exposing static quotes, a deterministic random quote selector, a daily quote, and simple reverse life clock stats.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features, their related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file and component.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes and applying base styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry configuring PWA metadata, icons, and service worker registration with auto-update logic.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining metadata, icons, theme colors, and display mode.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching, update logic, and fetch strategies with versioned cache invalidation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component providing theme support and rendering the dashboard with notifications.
frontend/src/components/ChronographTimer: Chronograph timer managing timed sessions, persistence, study logging, and displaying related study components.
frontend/src/components/DailyQuote.tsx: Displays the daily quote using data from useQuote with loading skeleton and styled card UI.
frontend/src/components/DaysRemaining.ts: Computes and displays days remaining until a goal date, updating every minute and reacting to goal updates.
frontend/src/components/ExecutionScore.t: Displays an execution score based on today's logged hours, with conditional states and tiered scoring labels.
frontend/src/components/FailureAlert.tsx: Shows timed alerts if today has zero hours by 9PM or if yesterday was missed, checking every minute.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/ForwardLifeClock: Displays a live updating 'life clock' showing day of year, date, and time with animated digit transitions.
frontend/src/components/GoalEditor.tsx: Provides a dialog to configure and save goal settings, updating localStorage and emitting a goalUpdated event.
frontend/src/components/NotificationMana: Manages notification permissions and sends periodic reminders if no study hours are logged.
frontend/src/components/NoZeroDaysIndica: Shows a small status indicator marking whether the day has zero study hours or is active.
frontend/src/components/PsychologicalTri: Displays a persistent bar showing remaining days until the goal, updating on interval and goal changes.
frontend/src/components/ReverseLifeClock: Countdown timer component that tracks remaining time toward a goal and updates every second, with animated digit changes and a goal editor.
frontend/src/components/StreakDisplay.ts: Shows current and longest study streaks using query hooks, with visual indicators for broken streaks.
frontend/src/components/StudyHeatmap.tsx: Renders a weekly heatmap of study hours with tooltips and live updates from study session events.
frontend/src/components/StudyProgressBar: Displays a bar chart of daily study hours for the last 30 days with dynamic coloring and live refresh.
frontend/src/components/StudyTracker.tsx: Empty component file with no implementation.
Modal dialog allowing users to select light, dark, or system theme using radio buttons.
frontend/src/components/TimeBasedMessage: Shows a motivational badge message based on the current time of day.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication provider and hook wrapping Dfinity Internet Identity, managing identity load, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks for fetching a daily quote with caching and day rollover checks, and managing study session data stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, light/dark theme CSS variables, utility classes, and global typography and background rules.
frontend/src/lib/studyActivityColors.ts: Exports color constants and helper functions to map study hours to activity levels and corresponding colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard layout including clocks, quote, timer, metrics, and theme dialog, updating time every second.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, color tokens, breakpoints, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and active feature requests related to responsive layout and daily quote updates.
